cause.description:
On saturday Dec. 1st, 2007 we will host an exciting 15-hour event that will promote student leadership in the community, health awareness, and lay the foundation for a strong NDSU tradition. We believe that together, the community of North Dakota State University can dedicate itself to raising at least $10,000 in donations.
Children's Miracle Network is a non-profit organization dedicated to saving and improving the lives of children by raising funds for children's hospitals across North America.
A founding commitment is to keep funds within the community in which they are generated. The average distribution of funds is as follows.
Charitable Care: 30% State-of-the-art Equipment: 11% Preventative Education: 5% Other Immediate Medical Needs: 39% Life-saving Research: 15%
Across the nation over 80 Dance Marathons occur annually. The event takes a dedicated team working year-round to generate community awareness, fundraising, and plan for the event itself. A Dance Marathon is a day-long event where students are entertained by local bands, student performing groups, and other volunteers. It is typically accompanied by a signature line dance, created specifically for the event, to boost morale and provide a source of confidence for students dancing throughout the night. There will be a “family hour” where representatives from Children's Miracle Network as well as children and families receiving support thank the participating students for their efforts. The Dance Marathon will provide a way for students to enjoy themselves and relieve stress before the end of the semester and finals. There will be a number of different incentive levels for acquiring donations as well as prizes for attendance.
***SIDE NOTE*** This event can't happen without an excellent committee to make it so. We are looking for dedicated individuals to help plan the event. If you're interested, e-mail @ stephen.boss@ndsu.edu ***************
1. Children are our future and each one deserves excellent medical care
2. May our dancing set an example to the community. We dance because we can stand for others.
cause.mission: The NDSU Dance Marathon Committee is devoted to bringing the campus of North Dakota State University together in a philanthropic push to benefit Children's Miracle Network (CMN)
cause.name: NDSU Dance Marathon
